H0.text: when did the sat become out of 1600. 2005

H1.text: when did the sat become out of 1600. 1990

H2.text: when did the sat become out of 1600. 2009

H3.text: when did the sat become out of 1600. 2014

A4.text: The changes introduced an additional section score, increasing the maximum SAT score to 2400.

A5.text: In early 2016, the SAT changes included making the essay optional (and returning the maximum score to 1600).

A6.text: The College Board designed the SAT in 1926.
